meanings.definition: To draw a line under (a word or phrase) to give emphasis or indicate special type.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys underlining important words in her book.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to underline the key points in the text.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally kept underlining the wrong words, making a funny mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to underlining every detail made her notes stand out.
meanings.sent5: Underlining the main ideas helps in better understanding the text.
